author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes the `FinalPath` feature from the framework following https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47529 that removed the use of it from the HLT menu. HLT requested quick removal of the feature from the framework in https://github.com/cms-sw/hlt-confdb/pull/103. This PR also removes the uses of `FinalPath` from HLT tools that were easily found with `git grep` (that was also asked in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47529).

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1297

#### PR validation:

Framework unit tests pass.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not planned to be backported, but theoretically could be backported to 15_0_X if requested.
title: Remove FinalPath from the framework
